section.title: site types master list of Site Types
section.para: Because Sites may serve multiple purposes―as warehouses, stores, etc.―the concept of Site Types allows you to categorize how Sites are used. To access the master list of Site Types, select the "Site Types" option. The following screen will appear.
The Site Types screen displays information on all existing Site Types, including Site Type code and Site Type description.
To the far right of the list, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Opens screen for creating a new Site Type.

Enables you to edit highlighted Site Type. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Site Type—except that when editing, the fields will contain Site Type information. Double-clicking on a Site Type will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Site Type and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Site Type and then select this button to remove the Site Type from the list.
